# Overview:

This repository contians the source code for the In-Accord App. This App is written with [NodeJs/Next]().

## Downloads:

These will link you to the latest builds found in the [releases](https://github.com/InAccord/installer/releases/) tab of this repository.



## Codebase: Updated soon!
```
├──client                  // Contians Client structor.
|  └──
├──server                 // Contians Server structor.
|  └──

```

---

# Development:

> This is a tutorial designed for people looking to contribute to, or work directly with the In-Accords App source code. If you are just looking to download and install InAccord, visit the [releases](https://github.com/GARD-Realms-LLC/In-Accord-web/) page of this repository.

## Prerequisites:
- [Github](https://github.com/)
- [VB-Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/)
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/)
- [React.js](https://react.dev/)
- [yarn](https://yarnpkg.com)


## Building: is "UNDER CONSTRUCTION!"

### 1: Clone the repository.
```ps
git clone https://github.com/GARD-Realms-LLC/In-Accord-web
```
This will create a local copy of this repository and navigate you to the root folder of the repository.

### 2: Install Dependencies
Run this command at the root folder to install dependencies:
```ps
npm install
```

### 3: Run Build Script
To run the installer in development mode, simply run the following command:
```ps
npm run dev
```

## Additional Scripts

### Linting
This project uses [ESLint](https://eslint.org/). Run this command to lint your changes:
```ps
yarn lint
```

### Compiling & Distribution:

```ps
yarn dist
```
